verses.verse: It happened on the day <WH3117> that Moses <WH4872> had finished setting up <WH6965> the tabernacle, <WH4908> and had anointed <WH4886> it and sanctified <WH6942> it, <WH3627> with all its furniture, and the altar <WH4196> with all its vessels, <WH3627> and had anointed <WH4886> and sanctified them; <WH6942>

that the princes <WH5387> of Israel, <WH3478> the heads <WH7218> of their fathers <WH1>' houses, <WH1004> offered. <WH7126> These were the princes <WH5387> of the tribes. <WH4294> These are they who were over <WH5975> those who were numbered: <WH6485>

and they brought <WH935> their offering <WH7133> before <WH6440> Yahweh, <WH3068> six <WH8337> covered <WH6632> wagons, <WH5699> and twelve <WH6240> oxen; <WH1241> a wagon <WH5699> for every two <WH8147> of the princes, <WH5387> and for each one <WH259> an ox: <WH7794> and they presented <WH7126> them before <WH6440> the tabernacle. <WH4908>
Yahweh <WH3068> spoke <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

"Accept <WH3947> these from them, <WH5647> that they may be used in doing the service <WH5656> of the Tent <WH168> of Meeting; <WH4150> and you shall give <WH5414> them to the Levites, <WH3881> to every man <WH376> according <WH6310> to his service. <WH5656>"
Moses <WH4872> took <WH3947> the wagons <WH5699> and the oxen, <WH1241> and gave <WH5414> them to the Levites. <WH3881>
He gave <WH5414> two <WH8147> wagons <WH5699> and four <WH702> oxen <WH1241> to the sons <WH1121> of Gershon, <WH1648> according <WH6310> to their service: <WH5656>

and he gave <WH5414> four <WH702> wagons <WH5699> and eight <WH8083> oxen <WH1241> to the sons <WH1121> of Merari, <WH4847> according <WH6310> to their service, <WH5656> under the direction <WH3027> of Ithamar <WH385> the son <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> the priest. <WH3548>

But to the sons <WH1121> of Kohath <WH6955> he gave <WH5414> none, <WH3808> because the service <WH5656> of the sanctuary <WH6944> belonged to them; <WH5375> they carried it on their shoulders. <WH3802>

The princes <WH5387> gave offerings <WH7126> for the dedication <WH2598> of the altar <WH4196> in the day <WH3117> that it was anointed, <WH4886> even the princes <WH5387> gave <WH7126> their offerings <WH7133> before <WH6440> the altar. <WH4196>

Yahweh <WH3068> said <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> "They shall offer <WH7126> their offering, <WH7133> each <WH259> prince <WH5387> on his day, <WH3117> for the dedication <WH2598> of the altar. <WH4196>"
He who offered <WH7126> his offering <WH7133> the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> was Nahshon <WH5177> the son <WH1121> of Amminadab, <WH5992> of the tribe <WH4294> of Judah, <WH3063>

and his offering <WH7133> was: <WH259> one silver <WH3701> platter, <WH7086> the weight <WH4948> of which was one hundred <WH3967> thirty <WH7970> shekels, <WH259> one silver <WH3701> bowl <WH4219> of seventy <WH7657> shekels, <WH8255> after the shekel <WH8255> of the sanctuary; <WH6944> both <WH8147> of them full <WH4392> of fine flour <WH5560> mixed <WH1101> with oil <WH8081> for a meal offering; <WH4503>
one <WH259> golden <WH2091> ladle <WH3709> of ten <WH6235> shekels, <WH4392> full of incense; <WH7004>
one <WH259> young <WH1241> bull, <WH6499> one <WH259> ram, <WH352> one <WH259> male lamb <WH3532> a <WH1121> year <WH8141> old, <WH5930> for a burnt offering;
one <WH259> male <WH8163> goat <WH8163> for a sin offering; <WH2403>

and for the sacrifice <WH2077> of peace offerings, <WH8002> two <WH8147> head of cattle, <WH1241> five <WH2568> rams, <WH352> five <WH2568> male goats, <WH6260> and five <WH2568> male lambs <WH3532> a <WH1121> year <WH8141> old. <WH7133> This was the offering of Nahshon <WH5177> the son <WH1121> of Amminadab. <WH5992>
On the second <WH8145> day <WH3117> Nethanel <WH5417> the son <WH1121> of Zuar, <WH6686> prince <WH5387> of Issachar, <WH3485> gave his offering. <WH7126>

He offered <WH7126> for his offering: <WH7133> one <WH259> silver <WH3701> platter, <WH7086> the weight <WH4948> of which was one hundred <WH3967> thirty <WH7970> shekels, <WH259> one silver <WH3701> bowl <WH4219> of seventy <WH7657> shekels, <WH8255> after the shekel <WH8255> of the sanctuary; <WH6944> both <WH8147> of them full <WH4392> of fine flour <WH5560> mixed <WH1101> with oil <WH8081> for a meal offering; <WH4503>
one <WH259> golden <WH2091> ladle <WH3709> of ten <WH6235> shekels, <WH4392> full of incense; <WH7004>
one <WH259> young <WH1241> bull, <WH6499> one <WH259> ram, <WH352> one <WH259> male lamb <WH3532> a <WH1121> year <WH8141> old, <WH5930> for a burnt offering;
one <WH259> male <WH8163> goat <WH8163> for a sin offering; <WH2403>

and for the sacrifice <WH2077> of peace offerings, <WH8002> two <WH8147> head of cattle, <WH1241> five <WH2568> rams, <WH352> five <WH2568> male goats, <WH6260> five <WH2568> male lambs <WH3532> a <WH1121> year <WH8141> old. <WH7133> This was the offering of Nethanel <WH5417> the son <WH1121> of Zuar. <WH6686>
On the third <WH7992> day <WH3117> Eliab <WH446> the son <WH1121> of Helon, <WH2497> prince <WH5387> of the children <WH1121> of Zebulun <WH2074>

gave his offering: <WH7133> one <WH259> silver <WH3701> platter, <WH7086> the weight <WH4948> of which was a hundred <WH3967> and thirty <WH7970> shekels, <WH259> one silver <WH3701> bowl <WH4219> of seventy <WH7657> shekels, <WH8255> after the shekel <WH8255> of the sanctuary; <WH6944> both <WH8147> of them full <WH4392> of fine flour <WH5560> mixed <WH1101> with oil <WH8081> for a meal offering; <WH4503>
one <WH259> golden <WH2091> ladle <WH3709> of ten <WH6235> shekels, <WH4392> full of incense; <WH7004>
one <WH259> young <WH1241> bull, <WH6499> one <WH259> ram, <WH352> one <WH259> male lamb <WH3532> a <WH1121> year <WH8141> old, <WH5930> for a burnt offering;
one <WH259> male <WH259> goat <WH8163> for a sin offering; <WH2403>

On the fourth <WH7243> day <WH3117> Elizur <WH468> the son <WH1121> of Shedeur, <WH7707> prince <WH5387> of the children <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205>

one <WH259> young <WH1241> bull, <WH6499> one <WH259> ram, <WH352> one <WH259> male lamb <WH3532> a <WH1121> year <WH8141> old, <WH5930> for a burnt offering;
one <WH259> male <WH8163> goat <WH8163> for a sin offering; <WH2403>

On the fifth <WH2549> day <WH3117> Shelumiel <WH8017> the son <WH1121> of Zurishaddai, <WH6701> prince <WH5387> of the children <WH1121> of Simeon <WH8095>

gave his offering: <WH7133> one <WH259> silver <WH3701> platter, <WH7086> the weight <WH4948> of which was one hundred <WH3967> thirty <WH7970> shekels, <WH259> one silver <WH3701> bowl <WH4219> of seventy <WH7657> shekels, <WH8255> after the shekel <WH8255> of the sanctuary; <WH6944> both <WH8147> of them full <WH4392> of fine flour <WH5560> mixed <WH1101> with oil <WH8081> for a meal offering; <WH4503>

On the eighth <WH8066> day <WH3117> Gamaliel <WH1583> the son <WH1121> of Pedahzur, <WH6301> prince <WH5387> of the children <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519>

gave his offering: <WH7133> one <WH259> silver <WH3701> platter, <WH7086> the weight <WH4948> of which was one hundred <WH3967> thirty <WH7970> shekels, <WH259> one silver <WH3701> bowl <WH4219> of seventy <WH7657> shekels, <WH8255> after the shekel <WH8255> of the sanctuary; <WH6944> both <WH8147> of them full <WH4392> of fine flour <WH5560> mixed <WH1101> with oil <WH8081> for a meal offering; <WH4503>

one <WH259> male <WH8163> goat <WH8163> for a sin offering; <WH2403>

and for the sacrifice <WH2077> of peace offerings, <WH8002> two <WH8147> head of cattle, <WH1241> five <WH2568> rams, <WH352> five <WH2568> male goats, <WH6260> and five <WH2568> male lambs <WH3532> a <WH1121> year <WH8141> old. <WH7133> This was the offering of Gamaliel <WH1583> the son <WH1121> of Pedahzur. <WH6301>
On the ninth <WH8671> day <WH3117> Abidan <WH27> the son <WH1121> of Gideoni, <WH1441> prince <WH5387> of the children <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144>

gave his offering: <WH7133> one <WH259> silver <WH3701> platter, <WH7086> the weight <WH4948> of which was one hundred <WH3967> thirty <WH7970> shekels, <WH259> one silver <WH3701> bowl <WH4219> of seventy <WH7657> shekels, <WH8255> after the shekel <WH8255> of the sanctuary; <WH6944> both <WH8147> of them full <WH4392> of fine flour <WH5560> mixed <WH1101> with oil <WH8081> for a meal offering; <WH4503>

one <WH259> male <WH8163> goat <WH8163> for a sin offering; <WH2403>

On the tenth <WH6224> day <WH3117> Ahiezer <WH295> the son <WH1121> of Ammishaddai, <WH5996> prince <WH5387> of the children <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835>

gave his offering: <WH7133> one <WH259> silver <WH3701> platter, <WH7086> the weight <WH4948> of which was one hundred <WH3967> thirty <WH7970> shekels, <WH259> one silver <WH3701> bowl <WH4219> of seventy <WH7657> shekels, <WH8255> after the shekel <WH8255> of the sanctuary; <WH6944> both <WH8147> of them full <WH4392> of fine flour <WH5560> mixed <WH1101> with oil <WH8081> for a meal offering; <WH4503>

On the eleventh <WH6249> day <WH3117> Pagiel <WH6295> the son <WH1121> of Ochran, <WH5918> prince <WH5387> of the children <WH1121> of Asher <WH836>

gave his offering: <WH7133> one <WH259> silver <WH3701> platter, <WH7086> the weight <WH4948> of which was one hundred <WH3967> thirty <WH7970> shekels, <WH259> one silver <WH3701> bowl <WH4219> of seventy <WH7657> shekels, <WH8255> after the shekel <WH8255> of the sanctuary; <WH6944> both <WH8147> of them full <WH4392> of fine flour <WH5560> mixed <WH1101> with oil <WH8081> for a meal offering; <WH4503>

This was the dedication <WH2598> of the altar, <WH4196> on the day <WH3117> when it was anointed, <WH4886> by the princes <WH5387> of Israel: <WH3478> twelve <WH6240> silver <WH3701> platters, <WH6240> twelve silver <WH3701> bowls, <WH4219> twelve <WH6240> golden <WH2091> ladles; <WH3709>

each <WH259> silver <WH3701> platter <WH7086> weighing one hundred <WH3967> thirty <WH7970> shekels, <WH259> and each bowl <WH4219> seventy; <WH7657> all the silver <WH3701> of the vessels <WH3627> two thousand <WH505> four <WH702> hundred <WH3967> shekels, <WH8255> after the shekel of the sanctuary; <WH6944>

the twelve <WH6240> golden <WH2091> ladles, <WH3709> full <WH4392> of incense, <WH7004> weighing ten <WH6235> shekels apiece, <WH3709> after the shekel <WH8255> of the sanctuary; <WH6944> all the gold <WH2091> of the ladles <WH3709> weighed one hundred <WH3967> twenty shekels; <WH6242>

all the cattle <WH1241> for the burnt offering <WH5930> twelve <WH8147> bulls, <WH6499> the rams <WH352> twelve, <WH8147> the male lambs <WH3532> a <WH1121> year <WH8141> old twelve, <WH8147> and their meal offering; <WH4503> and the male <WH8163> goats <WH5795> for a sin offering <WH2403> twelve; <WH8147>

and all the cattle <WH1241> for the sacrifice <WH2077> of peace offerings <WH8002> twenty <WH6242> - four <WH702> bulls, <WH6499> the rams <WH352> sixty, <WH8346> the male goats <WH6260> sixty, <WH8346> the male lambs <WH3532> a <WH1121> year <WH8141> old sixty. <WH8346> This was the dedication <WH2598> of the altar, <WH4196> after <WH310> it was anointed. <WH4886>

When Moses <WH4872> went <WH935> into the Tent <WH168> of Meeting <WH4150> to speak <WH1696> with Yahweh, <WH8085> he heard his voice <WH6963> speaking <WH1696> to him from above the mercy seat <WH3727> that was on the ark <WH727> of the Testimony, <WH5715> from between the two <WH8147> cherubim: <WH3742> and he spoke to him. <WH1696>
